verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H7725>turn<s%> back and <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6367>Pihahiroth,<s%> between <S%H4024>Migdol<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H5226>before<s%> <S%H1189>Baal<s%> <S%H2583>Zephon.<s%> You shall encamp <S%H6440>opposite<s%> it by the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H943><s%> 'They are entangled in the <S%H776>land.<s%> The <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> has shut them <S%H5462>in.<s%>'

I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he will <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3513>them;<s%> and I will get honor over <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and over all his <S%H2428>armies;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>" They did <S%H6213>so.<s%>

It was <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H1272>fled;<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> was <S%H2015>changed<s%> towards the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "What is this we have <S%H6213>done,<s%> that we have let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> from serving <S%H5647>us?<s%>"
He <S%H631>prepared<s%> his <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> his army with <S%H5971>him;<s%>

and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and all the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and captains over all of <S%H7991>them.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> with a <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

The <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5483>them:<s%> all the horses and <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> his <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and his <S%H2428>army;<s%> and <S%H5381>overtook<s%> them <S%H2583>encamping<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> beside <S%H6367>Pihahiroth,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Baal <S%H1189>Zephon.<s%>

When <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> drew <S%H7126>near,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H4714>behold,<s%> the Egyptians were <S%H5265>marching<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3966>them;<s%> and they were very <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> cried <S%H6817>out<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Because there were no <S%H6913>graves<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> have you taken us <S%H3947>away<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%> <S%H2063>Why<s%> have you <S%H6213>treated<s%> us this <S%H3318>way,<s%> to bring us out of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>

<S%H1697>Isn't<s%> this the word that we <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2308><s%> 'Leave us alone, that we may <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians?<s%>' For it were <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> than that we should <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid. Stand <S%H3320>still,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he will <S%H6213>work<s%> for you <S%H3117>today:<s%> for the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> whom you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> you <S%H5704>shall<s%> <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> them <S%H3254>again.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H3898>fight<s%> for <S%H2790>you,<s%> and you shall be still."

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Why do you <S%H6817>cry<s%> to <S%H1696>me?<s%> Speak to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they go <S%H5265>forward.<s%>

Lift <S%H7311>up<s%> your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H1234>divide<s%> <S%H1121>it:<s%> and the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on dry <S%H3004>ground.<s%>

<S%H2388>I,<s%> behold, I will harden the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and they shall go in <S%H935>after<s%> <S%H310>them:<s%> and I will get myself <S%H3513>honor<s%> over <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and over all his <S%H2428>armies,<s%> over his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and over his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

The <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I have gotten myself <S%H3513>honor<s%> over <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> over his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and over his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5265>moved<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H5982>them;<s%> and the pillar of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5265>moved<s%> from before <S%H6440>them,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> behind <S%H310>them.<s%>

It <S%H935>came<s%> between the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and there was the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> yet gave it <S%H215>light<s%> by <S%H3915>night:<s%> and the one <S%H7126>didn't<s%> come near the <S%H2088>other<s%> all the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> caused the <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> back by a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> all the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H4325>land,<s%> and the waters were <S%H1234>divided.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H4325>ground,<s%> and the waters were a <S%H2346>wall<s%> to them on their right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and on their <S%H8040>left.<s%>

The <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued,<s%> and went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> all of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5483>horses,<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

It happened in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> out on the <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> <S%H4264>army<s%> through the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> and of <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H2000>confused<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> <S%H4264>army.<s%>

He took <S%H5493>off<s%> their <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H212>wheels,<s%> and they <S%H5090>drove<s%> them <S%H3517>heavily;<s%> so that the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5127>"Let<s%>'s flee from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3898>fights<s%> for them against the <S%H4714>Egyptians!<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> may come <S%H7725>again<s%> on the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> on their <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and on their <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to its <S%H386>strength<s%> when the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6437>appeared;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3068>it.<s%> Yahweh <S%H5287>overthrew<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and the <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> even all <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2428>army<s%> that <S%H935>went<s%> in <S%H310>after<s%> them into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> There <S%H7604>remained<s%> not so much <S%H5704>as<s%> one of <S%H259>them.<s%>

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> land in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were a <S%H2346>wall<s%> to them on their right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and on their <S%H8040>left.<s%>

Thus <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> on <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H8193>seashore.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3027>work<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they <S%H539>believed<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and in his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
